website_summaries.verdict: Despite some small shortcomings, TDK's EB900 in-ear headphones sound as good--or better--than a lot of more-expensive competitors.
pros: equipped with comfortable foam ear tips
cons: When the music is off, you can hear when the cloth covering on the cord rubs against your clothing

customer_reviews.title: More punch for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for rock music. I have Bose QC-25 headphones & I love them, but they weren't made / eq'd for loud listening or strong beats & bass. These JBL's handle them nicely at an affordable price. The only flaw I've seen is that the vinyl covering is loosening inside the ear cups, but it's not a problem to date.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Blocks out outside noise all while giving top of the line sound quality. Just as good if not better than beats in quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a better cost.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving them to my son as a Christmas gift, he should be good using them as he needs a higher quality of headphones, I hear JBL's will work well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Regina McNair

customer_reviews.title: Yes I would buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Have two pair of these. For the money they are the best you can buy. Crisp Highs and remarkable Bass and Mid-range.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald SenearTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: JBL Rules!!!
customer_reviews.text: JBL never fails!!! This company always produce top quality stuff. These headphone make you feel like you are at a concert powered by a massive sound wall.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Deal!

customer_reviews.title: JBL Awesome phones
customer_reviews.text: great headphonesssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss comparable to more expensive head phones. I would reccomend this product to others because of the quality and defition of these
customer_reviews.author: Maurice E.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my husband and he loves them. No need to spend hundreds of dollars on headphones, this purchase is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Asunda Brandt

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SOUND thought there would be more bass. NOT METAL
customer_reviews.text: When I read the description, I thought that these were metal headphones. THEY ARE NOT. They are merely plastic. I don't know how strong they are but I trust JBL in making a good product. Also, they do leak sound so they aren't ideal for public use, but they are still great for around the house. And the bass isnt as great as JBL says it is. I really like my bass to be thumping and deep. Still, or the price, they are good. So I will give it 4 stars. I guess I was just hoping for a little more.
customer_reviews.author: devils1227

customer_reviews.title: Sound ok, covers falling apart after a few light uses
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look high quality. Come with a nice storage bag. Sound ok. I've looked at Monsters & Beats that were a lot more expensive & I don't know why. I also like the hi tech understated look. Update- I've had these for a month or so & only wear at work. I handle them gently. I noticed today the seam on the ear cup cover is already splitting. Now it's a week past the return policy. The black vinyl foam covers are just splitting worse and worse. Sound is just ok. I bought some Monoprice ear plug style headphones that sound amazing compared to these which cost double.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: JBL J55
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay. But it is very tight and not very adjustable. After wearing it for 5 minutes I got headache. So, I returned it after trying it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huang

customer_reviews.title: The lining of the padding ripped immediately
customer_reviews.text: They look a little bulky in your head but the sound is good. Too bad the lining of the padding ripped . . .
customer_reviews.author: jared adams

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, but maybe won't be able to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: The ear cushion broke after 3 weeks, can't be fix. Sound is good, but maybe won't be able to use it without the cushions....
customer_reviews.author: Prestige

customer_reviews.title: Balance and Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good, well rounded headphones, with no shortage of performance. The bass is good for hip-hop and dubstep but not so strong as to hamper my jazz, classical, or rock collections. I wish they could fold up but otherwise I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it. İ use it carefully but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. İ use it carefully but it s broken after 6 months. And then producer's representative in Turkey , didnt change the product. İ never buy JBL Harmann products again...
customer_reviews.author: Sertan Konur

customer_reviews.title: and it sounds very good, but J55 is better
customer_reviews.text: I have many headphones up to 125$ range, but this JBL J55 out do all...As im writing this review im listening to Beats Solo HD which cost a lot more, and it sounds very good, but J55 is better, just like any one, i just want a headset that sounds great, and J55 does it all, the price fools you, it should costs about 120$, but it only cost 39$, but J55 sounds clear, loud, and clean...For the price you cant beat it...buy it and be happy, dont look further or waste your money like i did...best buy...stay with JBL they know sounds and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery B. Vu

customer_reviews.title: At any rate I like them just fine
customer_reviews.text: I actually own these, not sure where I got them though. Might be here or at the "Egg" place :). At any rate I like them just fine. But the button on the cord doesn't seem to do anything? Could be my use scenario, I use them to DJ on the "net" and they are plugged into my computer. Maybe they only work if your connected to a smart phone? Anyway i would buy them again. So far mine have held up pretty good and the sound is awesome. But like others have said you can't hear anything else going on around you.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking headphone for bass heavy music, but needs quality control
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking headphone with removable cable, and fairly comfortable. The sound was a bit mixed however, as some types of music (hip hop/pop) sounded clean with decent bass, but with other types (rock) the upper mids had a hollow, unnatural cupped sound. This became noticeable when comparing to another set of headphones. Lastly, one earpiece broke open after only a week, so the quality control needs work as well.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound amazing, the bass and treble are balanced nicely
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound amazing, the bass and treble are balanced nicely. The only complaint I have is that I can't wear them for long. They suction to my ears and give me a headache. But I got them for 15 dollars, so I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: I can wholeheartedly recommend this product. It is by far one of the most awesome sounding headphones. The bass, the voice, every element of what you are listening to comes alive. It's how music should be listened to. Nobody will be disappointed with these in regards to sound. Your ears do start to heat up if you listen with these for long period of time. Except for that they are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus

customer_reviews.title: pretty damn good
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the sound, pretty damn good. The problem is that after 2 mounths of using them at my desk the foam earpiece on both sides started to come apart. These never even went outside! They sat on my desk, I would use them, I would place them back on my desk. The quality of the build sucks.
customer_reviews.author: rgrtom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best headphones I ever owned. Pros - Deep Bass and Sub-bass - Balanced Sound across all devices - Stylish Design - Foldable portable design with pouch - 3.5mm Cord can be de-attached Cons - People with big heads can find it uncomfortable I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GauravAgr

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!
customer_reviews.text: These sound good but they are way too small for my super large head. They already cracked on the headband. Won't recommend again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sidhu

product_meta.title: JBL J55 High-Performance On-Ear Headphones with JBL Drivers and Rotatable Ear-Cups - Black
product_meta.description:
Drawing on expertise learned from building some of the finest loudspeakers in the world, JBL engineers created lightweight, over-ear headphones with a fresh look and uncompromising JBL sound. The J55's premium drivers generate clarity and extended bass that competitive products simply can't touch. Pure, accurate bass lets you hear the truth from your music. Our unique, DJ pivot mechanism lets you rotate either ear-cup up to 180 degrees, which frees up one ear to hear outside sound. Bold styling details, including sandblasted, stainless steel ear-cup and headband accents, make J55 headphones an aesthetic, as well as acoustic, triumph.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


VIEW LARGER 








J55

THEY GENERATE PURE BASS – AND HEADPHONE ENVY.
Premium on-ear headphones with advanced drivers, DJ-pivot ear cups for single-ear listening and detachable, tangle-resistant cable.

• One hit wonders sound like world beaters courtesy of the amazing clarity and deep, accurate JBL® Pure Bass.

• Check the scene with the DJ-pivot ear cups that flip up when you need to be aware of external sounds. 

• Show some class with a sleek, contemporary design that incorporates stainless-steel accents and soft leather ear pads.




ACOUSTIC PERFORMANCE THAT OUTCLASSES THE COMPETITION.
Drawing on expertise learned from building some of the finest loudspeakers in the world, JBL engineers created lightweight, over-ear headphones with a fresh look and uncompromising JBL sound. The J55’s premium drivers generate clarity and extended bass that competitive products simply can’t touch. Pure, accurate bass lets you hear the truth from your music. Our unique, DJ pivot mechanism lets you rotate either ear-cup up to 180 degrees, which frees up one ear to hear outside sound. Bold styling details, including brushed stainless steel ear-cup and headband accents, make J55 headphones an aesthetic, as well as acoustic, triumph.

J55 AT A GLANCE: 
 * Bold JBL design and premium finishing
 * Premium, high-performance JBL drivers
 * Rotating, 180-degree DJ pivot mechanism
 * Soft leather ear cushions
 * Closed-back design
 * Single-side, detachable cable
 * Cable-locking mechanism
 * Rugged strain relief
 * Gold-plated jack with extension ring
 * Padded carry pouch


VIEW LARGERJ55 ear-cups rotate up to 180 degrees while you’re wearing them so you can keep one ear on your audio and one ear on external sounds or conversations KEY FEATURES
BOLD JBL DESIGN AND PREMIUM FINISHING
From the brushed stainless steel headband and ear-cup accents to the matte black or white housings, from the embossed, metallic JBL logos to the cable that matches the ear pads, these headphones are designed to be as pleasing to the eyes as they are to the ears.

PREMIUM, HIGH-PERFORMANCE JBL DRIVERS
JBL drivers deliver precise, powerful sound for an exceptional listening experience. Bass is pure, deep and accurately produced – the calling card of legendary JBL sound. As a result, J55s outperform competitive products costing much more. 

ROTATING, 180-DEGREE DJ PIVOT MECHANISM
Sometimes you need to be aware of more than just your music. J55 ear-cups rotate up to 180 degrees while you’re wearing them so you can keep one ear on your audio and one ear on external sounds or conversations. The ear-cups rotate under the headband for easy storage and transport.

VIEW LARGERThe tangle-resistant, flat elastomer cable connects to just one ear-cup, which further minimizes tangling 

SOFT LEATHER EAR CUSHIONS
Our ear cushions feature a soft leather that provides longwearing comfort. It also helps maintain an acoustic seal on the ear, which improves the headphones’ passive noise reduction. And that means a purer listening experience.

CLOSED-BACK DESIGN
J55 headphones feature a closed-back design that blocks ambient noise and minimizes leaking. So the outside noise stays outside, and your listening experience stays yours and yours alone. 

SINGLE-SIDE, DETACHABLE CABLE
Tangled cables are a constant source of frustration. But not with the J55s. The tangle-resistant, flat elastomer cable connects to just one ear-cup, which further minimizes tangling. The cable also detaches from the ear-cup for added flexibility.

CABLE-LOCKING MECHANISM
A unique, twist-lock mechanism keeps the detachable cable secure when it’s connected. When you plug the cable into the ear-cup, a simple twist locks it in place.

RUGGED STRAIN RELIEF
A strong, secure connection between the housing and cable is critical for both durability and sound quality. Our rugged strain relief connector dampens vibration for enhanced acoustic performance. 

GOLD-PLATED JACK WITH EXTENSION RING 
The gold-plated jack incorporates an extension ring that works with most custom smartphone covers and cases. So you don’t have to slip off your protective case to connect the headphones.

PADDED CARRY POUCH
JBL sound is always worth protecting. An included padded carry pouch keeps the headphones safe from bumps and bruises when you’re not wearing them.


PRODUCT SPECS
Specifications Type On-ear style Premium driver 1-5/8-inch (40mm) Frequency response 10Hz – 24kHz Impedance 32O Flat-elastomer cable 4' 3-3/16" (1.3M), single-side, detachable Plug 1/8" (3.5mm) gold plated 



WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * 1 set of JBL J55 on-ear headphones
 * 1 4' 3-3/16" (1.3M), single-side, detachable, flat elastomer cable
 * 1 padded carry pouch
 * Owner’s manual
 * Warranty card

DOCUMENTATION
Spec Sheet






HEAR THE TRUTH.
Even if you’ve never owned a JBL® product, you’ve almost certainly heard the JBL sound. It rings out loud and clear from the massive JBL loudspeaker arrays that hang in stadiums, sports arenas and concert venues everywhere. It literally surrounds you in more than 50 percent of all movie theaters worldwide, including many with THX® certification (a standard of realism that JBL engineering helped pioneer in 1983). Chances are, many of your favorite songs and movie soundtracks were mixed and mastered on JBL studio monitors – they’ve been the choice of audio professionals for more than 60 years. But you don’t have to venture far from home to experience the legendary power, clarity and technical accuracy of the JBL sound. It’s available in exceptional home entertainment systems that incorporate many of the same advanced technologies, materials and manufacturing techniques that we originally developed for professional systems. It’s even available in lightweight, portable packages that you and your friends can enjoy anywhere.
feature_bullets: Premium JBL drivers deliver incredible detail and low-end response
Exciting JBL design with premium finish
Rotating, 180-degree DJ pivot mechanism so you can keep one ear on your audio and one ear on external sounds or conversations
Closed-back design blocks ambient noise and minimizes sound leaking out
Padded carry pouch protects the headphones when on the go

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
